column1: Smoque BBQ////I love a nice brisket (which was good) but
column3: I would not waste more time on this place
column6: girls and trendies on an allowance stream out the doors.  My brisket was good
column8: but at what cost to wait forever
column10: warm it up and serve it?  There was no room for anyone more to sit and even those lunchroom-style tables
column11: where the trendies were already elbow-to-elbow
